pkgmetadata.longdescription: Conservation Indicators using Spatial Information // Supports the assessment of the degree of conservation of taxa in conservation systems, both in ex situ (in genebanks, botanical gardens, and other repositories) and in situ (in protected natural areas). Methods are described in Khoury et al. (2019) doi:10.1016/j.ecolind.2018.11.016, Khoury et al. (2019) doi:10.1111/DDI.13008, Castaneda-Alvarez et al. (2016) doi:10.1038/nplants.2016.22, and Ramirez-Villegas et al. (2010) doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0013497.
